short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use bubble breaker, to restrict contents that you hate from loading in your feed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bubble breaker is a time saving productivity extension to keep you away from unwanted social contents. Add filter/mute keywords to restrict related contents from loading in your social feeds.

Currently supported platforms:
- Youtube
- Reddit
- X/Twitter

Notes: 
1. This extension is experimental and limited in nature. Let me know your experiences.
2. Don't use too common keywords, this might break your website experience. If you go through same, please click RESET X in options to revert and get back to normal state.
3. This extension can break in future if there are any website changes in target websites. 
4. I will TRY to maintain, update and extend this extension regularly.
